Description:
<0>GetMinDistance - retrieves the minimum distance.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::GetMinDistance(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE* <2>MinDistance
<1>);
<2>MinDistance - pointer to a variable to which the current value of the minimum distance between the source and the listener is returned.

<0>SetMinDistance - sets the minimum distance.
<1>HRESULT IDirectSound3DBuffer::SetMinDistance(
<3/><1>D3DVALUE <2>MinDistance,
<3/><1>DWORD Apply
<1>);
<2>MinDistance - new value of minimum distance between source and listener. The default value is <2> DS3D_DEFAULTMINDISTANCE, equivalent to one unit of distance (one meter by default).
Name: Minimum distance
